1630 di dom konsthanthinu da sa, wisure ge bala kirima matha senarath rajuta erehiwa ohuge aganuwara aakramanaya kirima sandaha yamata thiranaya kaleya. 1630 agosthu 9 dina pruthugrisi soldaduwan 400 kda, wiwahaka 200 kda, 4400 k wu laskirinynya bhatayinda sabaragamuwe sita (rathnapura asala) uuwata kala madin gaman aarambha kalaha. 1630 agosthu 18 weni dina pruthugrisihu badullata athulu wuha.
